name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: The Monstera Deliciosa, often called the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a tropical icon known for its unique, fenestrated leaves. It's a relatively easy-to-care-for statement piece that brings a lush, jungle vibe to any room.

careGuide.Light: Bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid direct sun.
careGuide.Water: Water every 1-2 weeks, allowing soil to dry out between waterings.

shippingDetails: Ships within 3-5 business days. We offer a 14-day return policy on all plants if they arrive damaged.

name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant (Sansevieria trifasciata) is nearly indestructible—perfect for beginners. It tolerates low light and infrequent watering, while its upright form adds architectural interest.

careGuide.Light: Bright to low indirect light. Tolerates shade.
careGuide.Water: Water every 2–3 weeks; let soil dry out between waterings.
careGuide.Soil: Well-draining potting mix; avoid waterlogged soil.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig (Ficus lyrata) features large, glossy leaves that bring drama to any space. It prefers bright, filtered light and consistent moisture.

careGuide.Light: Bright, indirect sunlight near a window.
careGuide.Water: Water weekly when top 2 cm of soil feel dry.
careGuide.Humidity: Mist leaves or use a humidifier in dry climates.
careGuide.Pruning: Trim dead or yellowing leaves to encourage growth.

shippingDetails: Ships within 3–5 business days. 14-day damage guarantee applies.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a hardy succulent prized for its soothing gel. It thrives in bright light and minimal watering, making it ideal for sunny windowsills.

careGuide.Water: Water every 3 weeks; reduce in winter.
careGuide.Soil: Use cactus/succulent mix for fast drainage.

shippingDetails: Ships within 1–3 business days. 14-day return if plant arrives unhealthy.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia) has glossy, dark green leaflets and tolerates a wide range of conditions. Perfect for low-light offices and rooms.
shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. Damaged-on-arrival returns accepted within 14 days.

name: Pothos
description: Pothos (Epipremnum aureum) is a fast-growing vine with heart-shaped leaves. Extremely forgiving, it thrives in low light and can trail or climb.

careGuide.Water: Water every 1–2 weeks; allow topsoil to dry.
careGuide.Fertilizer: Feed monthly with balanced houseplant fertilizer.

shippingDetails: Ships within 1–3 business days. 14-day health guarantee.

name: Bonsai Ficus
description: A Ficus Bonsai brings miniature serenity indoors. Requires bright light and precise watering, rewarding you with delicate branching and leaves.

careGuide.Light: Bright, direct morning light is best.
careGuide.Water: Keep soil slightly moist; don't let it dry out completely.
careGuide.Pruning: Trim new shoots to maintain shape.

shippingDetails: Ships within 3–5 business days in climate-controlled packaging. 14-day return on arrival damage.
